text:
Work baseline sync:

So far I have the following issues closed:

API definition related issues:
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-292>
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-291>
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-293>

Gossip Discovery component implementation:
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-480>

Something unrelated- fixed a thread-safety bug in the go-logging dependancy that sometimes made our unit tests fail
I first fixed it in: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1261/>
But then I went on and simply fixed the bug in the vendor folder since go-logging maintainers didn't respond to the issue and PR I opened:
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-573>

Gossip pull algorithm implementation:
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-483>

Datastructures for gossip dissemination
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-484>

Made a security-related API change for our gossip component to be able to be resiliant to identity spoofing
This change will be implemented in next week
(from some reason there are 2 issues...)
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-511>
<https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-584>

Also have <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-482> in CR - this is a bug fix for the discovery implementation

I also finished writing the gossip module but I don't have a JIRA issue for that because I don't have a corresponding gerrit item.
Next week I hope to finish changing the communication module and will commit at least one of them for CR.
